trans-unit.source: Represents a delegate declaration.
<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate> can be used to declare a delegate type, or event handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate> 可以用於宣告委派類型或事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A delegate defines a method signature that can be used by calback methods or event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 委派會定義可供回呼 （callback） 方法或事件處理常式的方法簽章。

trans-unit.source: Delegates can be declared at the namespace level or nested inside other types.
trans-unit.target: 委派可以在命名空間層級中宣告或巢狀方式置於其他型別。

trans-unit.source: Delegates cannot be nested inside other delegates.
trans-unit.target: 委派不能放在其他委派。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate.ReturnType%2A> property specifies the data type of the event handler returned by the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate.ReturnType%2A>屬性會指定事件處理常式委派所傳回的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate.Parameters%2A> property contains the parameters for the delegate type.
<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate> should not be used for enumeration, interface, or type declaration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate> 不應該使用的列舉、 介面或型別宣告。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration> for those.
Not all languages support the declaration of delegates.
trans-unit.target: 並非所有語言都支援委派的宣告。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A> method with the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport.DeclareDelegates> flag to determine if it is supported in a particular language.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A>方法<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport.DeclareDelegates>旗標，以判斷它是否支援特定的語言。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates use of a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate> to declare a new delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate>宣告新的委派類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate" /> class.
The name of the delegate.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDelegate" /> class.
Gets the parameters of the delegate.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeParameterDeclarationExpressionCollection" /> that indicates the parameters of the delegate.
Gets or sets the return type of the delegate.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> that indicates the return type of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" />表示委派的傳回型別。
